pages.text: The $(d)Scalpel$() is a quick weapon that is used to gather several items that can be mixed with candle wax. This weapon is accurate and will fit well in any Candlemakers arsenal
Begin by crafting yourself the hilt of the scalpel. Two of these are required to make a full scalpel.

pages.title: A Dull Blade
pages.text: Next you will need to begin creating the blade. This blade is made from thin Iron so that it can make quick and precise cuts.

pages.title: Sharpening Time!
pages.text: Simply placing a dull scalpel blade into a stonecutting table will yield a $(d)Sharpened Scalpel Blade$().

pages.title: Finishing Touches
pages.text: Now these items can be combined to give you a $(d)Scalpel$().
The $(d)Scalpel$() can be used to obtain Zombie Ears. Simply hit a Zombie with the blade to chop its ears off.
The $(d)Scalpel$() can also be used to harvest Bat Eyeballs. Simply hit a Bat with the blade to cut out its eyes. Caution: Bat Eyes are magical and may grow wings when removed.
